forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Areas of fog early, becoming sunny this afternoon. High 14C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Areas of fog early, becoming sunny this afternoon. High 57F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low near 45F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny. High 16C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mainly sunny sky. High 62F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Generally fair. Low 44F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High near 15C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 58F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy in the evening, then off and on rain showers after midnight. Low near 10C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional showers late at night. Low around 50F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 14C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 57F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers and thundershowers during the evening will give way to steady rain overnight. Low 9C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers and thundershowers in the evening, then cloudy with rain likely overnight. Low 48F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 13C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 56F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Generally fair. Low 7C. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly clear skies. Low 44F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later in the day. High 13C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the morning. Increasing clouds with periods of showers later in the day. High 56F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 44F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 56F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 43F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.
